release_notes.en-US:
- SeaMonkey: Found a way to make Reply and Reply to All work with Identity Chooser installed

- On Windows: When an external application such as a web browser opens a Compose windows (via a mailto: link) the identities menu will pop up

- On Windows: The identities menu pops up if the user uses "Send To -> Mail recipient"

- Replying to a news posting now works as expected

- Fixed bug in mailto:-link handling

release_notes.en-US:
NEW: Cleaned up Settings dialog
NEW: Identities can be ordered to move often used identities to the top of the menu
NEW: Identities can be excluded from the Compose menus
NEW: Coloring of identities can be individually enabled
NEW: Identity Chooser now works in address book as well
NEW: Ctrl+N im Message composer opens a new composer with the currently selected identity

Open Issues: Italian locale is incomplete

release_notes.en-US:
- mailto:-links work with active ThunderBrowse addon
- Message Composer: Identity Chooser broke the paragraph format combo box in HTML mode
- The identity menu works again on email adresses in the message header
- Italian locale, thanks to Alex Vohwinkel
- French locale, thanks to Fabrice Bouchet
- Identity menu for Reply to List
- The order of the identities in the enhanced buttons is now the same as the order in the message composer's From: field.
- Disabling the colorize feature in the settings now removes the color in open compose windows
